text: Mera imanadara sevakaharula'i bhanidinus namajaharula'i nirantarata didaim kayama garun, ra juna kuro maile unala'i di'irakheko chu tyasamadhyebata kehi nakehi khulla ra gopya rupama kharca gardaigarun, yasabhanda pahileh ki tyo dina a'ipugos jasama na krayaâ€“bikraya hunecha nata mitrata naprema kama lagnecha
